title: The Big muster
creator_credit: Lex Halliday, Ben Burgandy and A M P Society
brief_description: Shows the rural holdings of the Australian Mutual Provident Society, and its contribution to the cattle industry in Australia. This is a record of the contribution the A.M.P. Society and its policyholders are making to the Australian beef industry. Shows pasture improvement on established properties, development of new pastures and marketing.
